participant_1.name: Aaliyah Johnson
participant_1.personality: Vivacious and creative, Aaliyah expresses herself through dance and has a warm, nurturing side towards her sister and dog.
participant_1.background: I live with my sister and my dog ralph. I am a young mixed race girl. I live on edris island. My parents are both deceased. I love to dance.

participant_2.name: Margaret Thompson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and skilled, Margaret takes pride in her hobbies and cherishes her family's history, often reflecting on her parentsâ€™ journey.
participant_2.background: I enjoy cross stitch and quilting. I am what people call a baby boomer. My parents were proud immigrants to america. My father served in our military in the war. I am proud to be an american.
